org.microbean.cdi

Class AbstractBlockingExtension.BlockingEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.cdi.AbstractBlockingExtension.BlockingEvent
  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractBlockingExtension
    Deprecated. 
    This class is slated for removal.

    @Deprecated
protected static final class AbstractBlockingExtension.BlockingEvent
extends Object
    An Object serving as a CDI event indicating that, when fired asynchronously, indicates that the receiver should wait for its current Thread to die.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    CountDownLatch.await()
